page.title: 08POST OFFICE/GENERAL STORES
page.content:
I live at the Post Office and General Stores in Burwardsley. My mother runs the Post Office and General Stores. We interviewed her. She has 65_70 customers a day. She sells groceries, stationary,tobbacco and newspapers.Her best customers are old age pensioners but in general all the local people support the Post Office well. Certain goods are deivered. The staff is as follows: Mum, one part_timer, and the family help too. Opening hours are from 8-30.a.m. to 1-00.p.m.and 2-15.p.m. to 5-30.p.m. from Monday to Saturday.On Tuesday it closes from 1-00.p.m.
DARREN
AGE 11.
